about_the_game:
Exist.EXE is a puzzle adventure where players assume the role of Marcus, a game developer who never moved on from his mother’s death. One day, he gets sucked into the digital world where he can use his programming skills to hack things and shape them to what he needs them to be.

Along the way, he realizes this is also a self-discovery journey for him as an AI entity resembling his dead mother persuades him to stay in the digital world and avoid sadness in real life while his best friend reminds him to stay true to reality instead of delving into the concept of a fake perfect world. Players will get to experience gameplay with distinctive and captivating visuals in pixel art blended with modern design elements.


Dive into an Immersive Digital World
Experience gameplay like never before with captivating modernized pixel art visuals and engaging mechanics that draw you into a abstract digital realm


Innovative Puzzle Mechanics
Dive into hacking-based puzzles that are designed to be intuitive and engaging for players of all skill levels, offering a fresh and strategic challenge


Intriguing Storyline
Follow the journey of a game developer trapped in a distorted game world, blending self-discovery with thrilling narrative twists

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz+, 32-bit
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon X1300/NVIDIA GeForce 6600 GT/Intel HD 3000 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Intel High Definition Audio

short_description: A pixel art puzzle adventure about Marcus, a game dev who never moved on from his mother’s death, getting sucked into a digital world where he hack objects using his programming skills. An AI will persuade him to stay in the fake perfect world to avoid sadness in reality and thus think more of life.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French
